title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2024 

(Commencement) (No. 4) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2024 (commencement) (no 4) order 2025

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: In this Order “Act of 2024” means the Planning and Development Act
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Act of 2024” means the Planning and Development Act 

2024 (No. 34 of 2024).
text_norm: 2 order act 2024 mean planning development act 2024 (no 34 2024)

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 3. (1) The 2nd day of October 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. (1) The 2nd day of October 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the 
extent specified in that Part, come into operation. 

(2) The 2nd day of October 2025 is appointed as the day on which the repeal 
of the provisions of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) 
effected by section 6 of the Act of 2024 and specified in Part 2 of the Schedule 
shall, to the extent specified in that Part, come into operation. 

(3) The 2nd day of October 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
amendments to the enactments referred to in section 631 of the Act of 2024 shall, 
to the extent specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd October, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [452] 3

text_raw:

PART 3 

Commencement of Certain Amendments effected by section 631 of Act of 
2024 

The amendment (specified at reference number 8 of column (1) of 
Schedule 7 to the Act of 2024) of the Local Government Act 1991 (No.11 
of 1991). 

The amendment (specified at reference number 11 of column (1) of 
Schedule 7 to the Act of 2024) of the Roads Act 1993 (No. 14 of 1993) (in 
this paragraph referred to as the “Act of 1993”) in so far only as it – 

(a) 

inserts a definition of “Act of 2024” in subsection (1) of section 
2 of the Act of 1993, and 

(b) 

amends paragraph (c) of section 51AA of that Act.

title: provisions of the Act of 2024 specified in Part 1 of the Schedule shall, to the
heading: 16. The amendment (specified at reference number 67 of column (1) of
text_raw:
16. The amendment (specified at reference number 67 of column (1) of 
Schedule 7 to the Act of 2024) of the Local Government (Mayor of 
Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) in so 
far only as it amends the definition of “National Planning Framework” and 
“regional spatial and economic strategy” in subsection (1) of section 29 of 
that Act. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 October, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
